tutorial-step-1: Welcome to the guide. This is the workspace that enables you to structure your decision-making models
tutorial-step-2: The side panel contains functionalities that can be used for prototyping
tutorial-step-3: This area allows you to invoke the available actions
tutorial-step-4: The arrow parameter settings allow you to modify their appearance
tutorial-step-5: The list includes functionalities available for the design of decision-making models
tutorial-step-6: Click on an item in the list to add it to the workspace
tutorial-step-7: Newly added elements will appear here as blocks
tutorial-step-8: Click on the next item in the list to add it to the workspace
tutorial-step-9: Tap a block to select it
tutorial-step-10: Tap the block to create a connection
tutorial-step-11: Press the arrow to delete the connection
tutorial-step-13: Once the structure of the decision model has been created, calculations will be performed according to the functionalities used
tutorial-step-14: Examples showing selected possibilities for creating structures are shown in the 'About' tab in section 'Instructions'.
tutorial-step-15: We wish you a successful design and efficient use of the application ðŸ˜Š
